author: TypeScriptLibs and Contributers
description: TypeScript Library for the Mastodon API
name: tsl-mastodon-api

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:amd && npm run build:lib
scripts.build:amd: cp -f src/Bridge-AMD.ts src/Bridge.ts && tsc -p src/tsconfig-amd.json ; rm src/Bridge.ts
scripts.build:lib: cp -f src/Bridge-Node.ts src/Bridge.ts && tsc -p src/tsconfig.json ; rm src/Bridge.ts
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run server:start && npm run test:run ; npm run server:stop
scripts.test:amd: npm run build && ( sleep 5 ; open 'http://127.0.0.1:8004/tst-data/amd/' ) & python3 -m http.server 8004
scripts.watch:amd: npm run clean && cp -f src/Bridge-AMD.ts src/Bridge.ts && tsc -p src/tsconfig-amd.json --watch ; rm src/Bridge.ts
scripts.watch:node: npm run clean && cp -f src/Bridge-Node.ts src/Bridge.ts && tsc -p src/tsconfig.json --watch ; rm src/Bridge.ts
